SYSUTIL.COMMENT: SYSUTIL - Natural tools and utilities for NaturalONE. IMPORTANT: Do not modify this member. (C) COPYRIGHT 2018 by SOFTWARE AG, Darmstadt (Germany)

TOOL.NAME: ADACALL
TOOL.TITLE: Adabas Direct Calls
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Issues Adabas direct calls (native commands) directly to an Adabas database.

TOOL.NAME: BUS
TOOL.TITLE: Buffer Usage Statistics
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Provides information on the buffers allocated for the current Natural session, their sizes, and the actual buffer space being used.

TOOL.NAME: COMPOPT
TOOL.TITLE: Compilation Options
TOOL.DESCRIPTION:
Views compilation settings.
Note: Modifications made from NaturalONE will not be permanent.

TOOL.NAME: CPINFO
TOOL.TITLE: Code Page Information
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Displays all relevant Natural code page settings.

TOOL.NAME: DUMP
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Diagnosis Information
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Provides information for Software AG technical support personnel in order to locate an error that caused an abnormal termination (abend) of the Natural system.

TOOL.NAME: GLOBALS
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Session Parameters
TOOL.DESCRIPTION:
Views Natural session parameters.
Note: Modifications made from NaturalONE will not be permanent.

TOOL.NAME: LIST
TOOL.TITLE: List Natural Object(s)
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Lists objects which are contained in the current library.

TOOL.NAME: LISTDBRM
TOOL.TITLE: List DBRMs
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Displays existing DBRMs (Natural for DB2) or existing packages (Natural for SQL) of Natural programs or Natural programs referencing a given DBRM.

TOOL.NAME: LISTSQLB
TOOL.TITLE: Explain SQL Statements
TOOL.DESCRIPTION:
Explains SQL statements.
Note: This command is only available with Natural for DB2.

TOOL.NAME: MSG
TOOL.TITLE: Message Retrieval
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: HTML:SAG-UTIL-MSG.HTM

TOOL.NAME: NATQVS
TOOL.TITLE: Machine Characteristics
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Displays information about the characteristics of the machine that is currently executing Natural (for example, the CPU ID).

TOOL.NAME: Optimize
TOOL.TITLE: Test the Adabas and Natural Data Collectors
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Reviews the data provided by the Adabas and Natural Data Collectors for Optimize for Infrastructure.

TOOL.NAME: ROUTINES
TOOL.TITLE: External Subroutine Usage
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Ascertains which cataloged objects in the current library use which external subroutines.

TOOL.NAME: SHOWDBS
TOOL.TITLE: Show Databases
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Views information on the databases available in your environment and the options (like read-only properties) defined for them.

TOOL.NAME: SYSAPI
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Add-On APIs
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Locates Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) provided by Natural add-on products.

TOOL.NAME: SYSBPM
TOOL.TITLE: Buffer Pool Management
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Monitors and controls the Natural buffer pool.

TOOL.NAME: SYSCP
TOOL.TITLE: Code Page Administration
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Provides code page information and can be used to administrate code pages for Natural source objects.

TOOL.NAME: SYSDB2
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Tools for DB2
TOOL.DESCRIPTION:
Invokes Natural Tools for DB2.
Note: This command is only available with Natural for DB2.

TOOL.NAME: SYSEXT
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Application Programming Interfaces (APIs)
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Locates Natural Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).

TOOL.NAME: SYSEXV
TOOL.TITLE: New Features of Natural Versions
TOOL.DESCRIPTION:
Provides examples of new features of Natural versions.
The examples can be listed by category, version or member name.

TOOL.NAME: SYSPARM
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Parameter Profile Maintenance
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Creates and maintains Natural parameter profiles containing a set of Natural profile parameters.

TOOL.NAME: SYSRPC
TOOL.TITLE: Natural RPC Maintenance
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Establishes and maintains Natural RPC (Remote Procedure Call) environments.

TOOL.NAME: SYSTP
TOOL.TITLE: Natural Characteristics for TP Monitors
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Monitors and controls TP-monitor-specific characteristics of Natural.

TOOL.NAME: TECH
TOOL.TITLE: Technical Session Information
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Displays technical and other information about the Natural session.
